patterns.title: Present Simple Tense
patterns.explanation: Used for habits, general truths, and regular actions.

patterns.title: Past Simple Tense
patterns.explanation: Used for completed actions in the past.

dialogs.title: Basic Greeting
dialogs.scenario: Meeting someone for the first time

conversation.speaker: Person A
conversation.text: Hello! My name is John. What's your name?

conversation.speaker: Person B
conversation.text: Hi John! I'm Maria. Nice to meet you!

conversation.speaker: Person A
conversation.text: Nice to meet you too! Where are you from?

conversation.speaker: Person B
conversation.text: I'm from Spain. And you?

conversation.speaker: Person A
conversation.text: I'm from the United States.

conversation.speaker: Waiter
conversation.text: Good evening! Are you ready to order?

conversation.speaker: Customer
conversation.text: Yes, I'd like a salad and the pasta, please.

conversation.speaker: Waiter
conversation.text: Would you like something to drink?

conversation.speaker: Customer
conversation.text: A glass of water, please.

conversation.speaker: Waiter
conversation.text: Perfect! Your order will be ready soon.
